idea-plugin.name: macOS Dark Mode Sync
idea-plugin.description:
Synchronizes IDEA theme to macOS's and Windows' Dark Mode. When macOS or Windows is in dark mode, plugin sets IDEA to Darcula, but when macOS is in light mode, sets IDEA theme to IntelliJ as standard options.
Changes to your own favorite themes can be made via IDEA Preferences -> Dark Mode Sync
idea-plugin.change-notes: Use Settings to choose Dark and Light themes. Added Support for Windows.
